column4: How do i boot from my ubuntu live CD, grub just laods its screen and i cant see an option to boot from CD
does your PC boot from CD at all?
i have the grub menu up but there is no boot from CD option guntbert
when you see the grub-menu from your harddisk, its too late for the CD, have a look at the system-bios, boot-sequence
i prss F12 at start upto show the boot menu, but it only displays grub
can you boot from another CD?
i ahve booted fromt he cd before when i was originally running windwos in order to set up a dual boot guntbert
ty for the help anyway guntbert <3
there could be another reason: is this a newly burnt CD?
are you sure the image was ok? did you check?
i didnt chekc the image, but is working from it now
good for you :), but next time you better check anyway
